WorkflowInfo.Name: Check number of rows in database table
WorkflowInfo.Description: Check number of rows in database table
WorkflowInfo.XML:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:TSQLQuery;Assembly=TSQLQuery, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:GetRowsCount;Assembly=GetRowsCount, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:ReturnValue;Assembly=ReturnValue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns3="clr-namespace:SendEmail;Assembly=SendEmail, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"><ns0:TSQLQuery Password="123456" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" isUserAuthenticate="True" DisplayName="TSQL Query" IsValid="True" SiteId="0" ConnectionString="Data Source=myServerAddress;Initial Catalog=myDataBase;User Id=sql_user;Password=123456;" TypeName="TSQLQuery" Query="select * from hosts" SiteName="Default Site" EyeShareConnectionString="False" TimeInSeconds="0" x:Name="tsqlQuery1" Timeout="00:01:00" UserName="sql_user" Description="Preforms a database query on Microsoft SQL Server" ConnectionStringTextBox="Data Source=myServerAddress;Initial Catalog=myDataBase" /><ns1:GetRowsCount IsValid="True" x:Name="getRowsCount1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ResultSet="%tsqlQuery1%" DisplayName="Get Rows Count" ResultSetName="tsqlQuery1" Description="Gets the amount of rows in a resultset." TypeName="GetRowsCount" /><IfElseActivity x:Name="ifElseActivity1"><IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity1"><ns2:ReturnValue Value="1000" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="False" UseStoredValue="False" ConditionType="<=" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=&&& <= 1000" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="UserDefinedValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /></IfElseBranchActivity><IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity2"><ns2:ReturnValue Value="1000" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue2" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="True" UseStoredValue="False" ConditionType=">" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=&&& > 1000" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="UserDefinedValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /><ns3:SendEmail Channel="0" TimeInSeconds="0" Subject="There are more than a 1000 rows in the DB" DestinationNumber="1" x:Name="sendEmail1" TemplateNumber="0" ShiftLevel="" IsValid="True" HostId="-2" TemplateName="" TypeName="SendEmail" SendRN="False" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" DestinationTypeCc="User" DestinationType="User" HostName="{x:Null}" Timeout="00:00:00" DisplayName="Send Email" Attachments="" Cc="" Description="Send an email to a user, a group or a duty." Continue="False" DestinationNumberCc="0" Body="<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN">
<HTML><HEAD>
<META content="text/html; charset=windows-1252" http-equiv=Content-Type>
<META name=GENERATOR content="MSHTML 9.00.8112.16434"></HEAD>
<BODY><PRE><PRE>Current number of rows in the DB is: %getRowsCount1%</PRE></PRE></BODY></HTML>
" To="Admin" ShiftLevelCc="" MessageType="Custom" /></IfElseBranchActivity></IfElseActivity></SequentialWorkflowActivity>
